definitions.text: a mark (') placed above a vowel to indicate pronunciation
having or experiencing a rapid onset and short but severe course
examples: the acute phase of the illness

definitions.text: having or demonstrating ability to recognize or draw fine distinctions
examples: an acute observer of politics and politicians
as sharp and incisive as the stroke of a fang

definitions.text: of an angle; less than 90 degrees

examples: an acute (or critical) lack of research funds
